sentences: Paul Arditti is a British sound designer, working mainly in the UK and the US.
In the UK, he has designed sound at the Royal Court, Royal National Theatre, Royal Shakespeare Company, Almeida Theatre, Young Vic Theatre, and in the West End, as well as many regional theatres.
In September 2015 Paul was appointed an Associate Director at the National Theatre.
Paul studied Drama and English at The University of Hull, graduating in 1983.
